segments.text: My eyes keep going back to that stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly wobbly, almost like it's about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed out, tilted precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so high, stretching his body, which can't be helping its stability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he could tumble right off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would be a nasty fall, especially onto a hard kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing a little too close, she might get caught in the fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stabilize that stool before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation just screams danger to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the cookie jar, completely unaware of the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a genuine concern, seeing him up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Children really don't think about these things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling makes me quite uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR
